node.display_name: PIAA Lighting 540 Plasma Ion Fog Lamp Kit
node.long_desc: Includes two lamps;Wiring kit;Black mesh covers;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Big, bold design in a small package. Ultra thin housing allows for easy installation. Designed specifically for small, mid-size trucks and SUVs. Unique black mesh style lens cover offers additional protection while enhancing your vehicle?s appearance.

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Strut Extension Leveling Kit
node.long_desc: Installation Hardware;Sold As: Pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This leveling kit features a pair of one-piece heavy-duty 1/4 inch thick leveling spacers that are laser cut and precision welded to insure the highest quality and fitment. Allows the vehicle to run up to a 33 inch diameter tire. This system works without the need of a coil spring compressor and can be installed in 1.5-2 hours and comes complete with everything necessary for installation.

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Urethane Bushings Body Bushing
node.long_desc: Urethane Bushings; Body Bushing Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Performance Accessories replacement urethane body bushing kits have proven to be a popular addition to their product line! Truck, Jeep, and SUV bodies make big demands on their bushings, which over time crack, distort and crush. So If your replacing your body bushings why not add a Body Lift at the same time.

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Torsion Bar Leveling Key
node.long_desc: Torsion Bar Leveling Key; 1.5-2.5 in. Lift;Installation Instructions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Performance Accessories Leveling Kits give your truck or jeep an aggressive off-road stance without compromising factory handling characteristics. Easy to install and inexpensive, these are an economical alternative to complete suspension lift systems. Add some slightly larger tires, a winch, heavy duty bumper or snow plow without sagging and rubbing your tires.

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Lift And Level Kit
node.long_desc: Front Lift: 3 inch Strut Spacers;Rear Lift: 1 inch Block and U-Bolt Kit;Sway Bar Spacer Kit;Complete Installation Hardware Pack;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Performance Accessories designed a 3 inch one-piece strut extension leveling kit for 2007-2015 Toyota Tundra that corrects the front-to-rear stance of the vehicle. This leveling kit features a pair of one-piece heavy-duty 1/4 inch thick front leveling spacers that are laser cut and precision welded to ensure the highest quality and fitment. Also includes machined differential drop down spacers, front skid plate spacers, sway bar spacers, rear lift blocks, U-bolts and hardware. Allows the vehicle to run up to a 33 inch diameter tire. This system works without the need of a coil spring compressor and can be installed in 2-3 hours and comes complete with everything necessary for installation.

node.long_desc: Shackles;Installation Hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Constructed Of 3/16 Inch Thick Steel,Welded Center Supports,Rounded Corners,Includes Grade 5 Zinc Hardware,Includes All Necessary Installation Instructions,Includes Full Technical Support,Clad In Durable Gold Zinc Finish,Limited Lifetime Warranty

node.long_desc: Preserves factory suspension geometry;Maintains factory turning radius;Preserves vehicle driveline angles;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you want to put larger tires on your Jeep, truck or SUV, Performance Accessories Premium Lift Systems offer the affordable solution. Performance Accessories Premium Lift Kits combine their body lift kit, leveling kit and gap guards, providing an economical way to raise your vehicle between four and six inches. Premium Lift Systems deliver the most lift for the money of any lift solution available today! Premium quality, appearance and performance, without the premium price tag!

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Master Kit Body Lift Kit
node.long_desc: Body Lift Kit; 2 in. Lift; Incl. Front Bumper Brackets; Urethane Gap Guards; Steering Extension Included;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Is your truck or SUV saggin' and draggin'? Is a level bed and body a distant memory? Is your rough ride accompanied by the sound of grinding metal? Would you like to restore your vehicle to a comfortable, squared-up ride and add some lift too? And what about those wheel wells? Now that your ride is looking tough and going right, wouldn't you like to clean them up as well? No problem - Performance Accessories offers Master Kits for select vehicles, These kits include custom urethane replacemant body bushings, the famous Performance Accessories body lift kit tailored specifically for your truck or SUV, and a set of indestructible urethane gap guards to finish off those wheel wells.

node.display_name: Performance Accessories Urethane Bushings Radius/Strut Arm Bushing
node.long_desc: Urethane Bushings; Radius/Strut Arm Bushing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Urethane Bushings last far longer and perfom much better than tradional rubber bushings. Replacing rubber bushings on your truck not only increases performance but adds to the visual appeal of your vehicle.

node.long_desc: Leaf Spring Perch;Weld-On;Sold As: Pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Performance Accessories Leaf Spring Perches are intended to be welded to the axle tube for custom leaf spring mounting. Sold in sets of two. Made from high quality domestic steel, with rounded edges for a perfect fit.

node.long_desc: 1500 Series Lens, Clear, Back Up, Replacement Lens only;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: We carry a full line of genuine PIAA replacement parts to keep your PIAA investment working for the life of your vehicle. If the trail bites back you can replace your cracked or broken Lenses here.

node.long_desc: Pavement Ends Emergency soft top for Jeeps quickly provides protection for occupants from sudden downpours;These Jeep soft tops are made of rain-resistant PVC fabric;Compact, lightweight, easy to store and use in a moment's notice;Kit comes with top, emergency stuff storage sack and 2 rain ponchos;Pavement Ends Emergency CJ and Wrangler soft top is available in Black only;One year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Top is compact, lightweight and easy to store. Can be used in a moment's notice in those sudden down pours. Made of rain-resistant PVC-Fabric. Comes in a convenient stuff storage bag and includes two rain ponchos. Available in black only. Emergency Top is meant to be used for short, low speed trips under 15 MPH. *May not work with flush-mounted taillights.

node.long_desc: Thick powder coating for extreme scratch resistance;3/16 inch thick stamped steel;Measures 50 inch long x 6 inch tall;1 inch thick d-ring mounts;Pre-drilled license plate mounting holes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Quality bumpers that don't break the bank. 3/16 inch stamped steel for superior strength. Thick powder coating for extreme scratch resistance. Open construction on the back side, which allows for easy customization. Add your winch plate, lights and other brackets as needed. Predrilled for license plate mounting holes.

node.long_desc: 6061 forged aluminum;Mirror polish finish;Strengthen the visual appeal of your ride;Direct bolt-on applications;Aluminum wheel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: American Force Wheels has been using the latest technologies and finest materials to manufacture custom wheels for North America?s truck enthusiasts. American Force understands that style and function are inseparable and their reputation for design has grown internationally. Aftermarket Companies in search of radical wheel designs for breakthrough vehicles use American Force Wheels. Today American Force Wheels are the finishing touch on dream trucks conceived by custom truck builders. While American Force is proud of their role in vehicle design, their wheels are designed for the real world. All American Force Wheels come with a lifetime warranty against any manufacturing defects.

node.sales_desc: Xenon Sport Flares are made of a tough, durable urethane. Other flares are manufactured from rigid fiberglass or thin wall ABS plastic. With a minimum 1/8 wall thickness, Xenon Sport Flares are virtually unbreakable. In fact we're so confident in our product, it comes with a Limited Lifetime Warranty. Xenon Sport Flares can be installed in their natural satin black finish or easily painted prior to installation. Complete painting instructions are included in every kit."

node.long_desc: A pull scale is helpful in setting up the shims on a knuckle. By increasing the shims above and below the knuckle the knuckle becomes tighter. When installing new knuckle bearings we recommend checking the shims with a pull scale. Attach the pull scale on the steering arm with the tie rod / drag link removed and the felt on the back side of the knuckle not yet installed. The knuckle should not move until about 15 lbs of force is applied to the steering arm.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: A pull scale is helpful in setting up the shims on a knuckle. By increasing the shims above and below the knuckle the knuckle becomes tighter. When installing new knuckle bearings we recommend checking the shims with a pull scale. Attach the pull scale on the steering arm with the tie rod / drag link removed and the felt on the back side of the knuckle not yet installed. The knuckle should not move until about 15 lbs of force is applied to the steering arm.

node.long_desc: If you are installing dual transfer cases on your Toyota Pickup or 4Runner you will require a custom crossmember that moves the mounts and you will want to protect them from trail damage with a crossmember that can take serious trail punishment. Fits 1979-1995 Toyota Pickup and 4Runner with 4 or 5 speed manual transmission and dual transfer case. Not intended for auto transmission applications.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear Axle Housing Leaf Spring E-Locker
node.long_desc: This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gears knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gears knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.

node.display_name: Trail Gear Axle Housing Kit IFS Width E-Locker Bolt Pattern
node.long_desc: Trail-Gear introduces a new concept to the axle housing design. This exclusive design features axle tubes that have been offset above the housing centerline making the inner axle shafts ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. This repositioning of the axle tube results are an increase of 3/8in. ground clearance under the axle tubing. Trail Gear uses axle tubes made from 5/16 inch thick, high strength DOM steel tubing and engage 5/8in. farther into the center section. On top of that, there is a 360 gusset welded around the tubes on the inside of the housing to ensure unparalleled strength. The heavy-duty, press formed, 1/4in. plate steel center section shell is specially shaped to ensure a minimum of 3/4in. additional clearance under the differential. The differential mounting surface is made from inch plate steel to ensure studs can not pull out, even under heavy loads. The outer offset flanges are made from 4130 Chromoly to prevent distortion or bending. Housings are precision aligned using start-of-the-art, 3D digital imaging equipment.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Trail-Gear introduces a new concept to the axle housing design. node.display_name: Trail Gear Axle Housing Inspection Hole Kit
node.long_desc: Extra large differential fill and inspection cap. Designed to allow quick access for inspecting the ring gear. Features 1.5 inch diameter access hole. Threaded aluminum cap uses a rubber o-ring for a tight seal. Installation requires cutting a hole in to the top of the differential housing and welding on a threaded bung. Kit includes: one threaded bung, one cap and one o-ring. Plug kit can be ordered loose as a do-it your-self install or it can be ordered installed into a housing if you are ordering a housing at the same time.;California Residents: WARNING"

Threaded aluminum cap uses a rubber o-ring for a tight seal. Installation requires cutting a hole in to the top of the differential housing and welding on a threaded bung. Kit includes: one threaded bung, one cap and one o-ring. Plug kit can be ordered loose as a do-it your-self install or it can be ordered installed into a housing if you are ordering a housing at the same time.

node.long_desc: This kit totally eliminates the problem of broken steering knuckles and studs. node.long_desc: The Synergy Double Adjuster Tube Adapter is designed to eliminate the need for jam nuts that are normally used when building link suspension & steering systems. The use of the Double Adjuster allows the suspension/steering link to be adjusted without removal. The Double Adjuster allows the user to fine-tune the suspension/steering geometry by loosening the pinch bolt and turning the adjuster sleeve. The tube adapter seals the link off from water or other debris entering the link which can cause damage over time.An integrated drain hole lets any water that enters the threads of the adapter drain out.;California Residents: WARNING"

For use with All BAKFlip Styles G2, HD, F1 and CS; Fold-ups easily to free up full length of truck bed; Load capacity up to 400 lb; Fits under tonneau covers by BAK; Keeps content dry and secure when tonneau cover is closed; Invisible when tonneau cover is closed; Measurements: 11 inch deep, 10 inch wide and up to 65 inch long; Organizing tray that can slide from side to side of the box for management of small objects; Panels match the tonneau cover; The BakBox is made the same way as the BAK tonneau covers, from strong double sided aluminum or composite panels; Powder coat finish to the highest standards;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The BakBox is a collapsible cargo or toolbox that snaps onto the rail of any BakFlip tonneau cover. When it's installed and the cover is closed, nobody will even know that it's there. The BakBox flips out from the back wall of your truck to give you a full, secure tool chest and cargo management box. It disappears just as easily when you don't need it or simply need to use your full truck bed! The BakBox is 11 inches deep and 10 inches wide and up to 65 inches long, giving you a very generous size box behind your cab and can withstand up to 400lbs of weight, allowing you to store heavy tools or objects. The BakBox will keep all contents safe and dry when your BakFlip tonneau cover is closed. Carry tools, groceries, clothes, books, you name it, the BakBox will be there when you need it! The shifting tray allows management of small objects that can easily be slid out of the way or shifted from side to side of your way. Add ice and it becomes one incredible party chest! BakBox is built to last and easy to install!

node.long_desc: BigHead Wastegate Actuator;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: When turbo exhaust back pressure increases, the stock actuator prematurely blows off the seat, softening boost in the midrange and killing torque. With twice the diaphragm area and spring pressure of the stock Wastegate, Banks BigHead Wastegate Actuator keeps the valve seated longer and achieves a higher peak boost, sooner. At peak, BigHead opens the Wastegate and holds its position, for precise boost control that gives you crisp acceleration and more mid-range pulling power.

node.long_desc: No matter if you are pre-running, rock crawling, or just mall crawling, your 95 1/2 to 2004 Tacoma frame is a weak link in an otherwise tough and dependable truck. The portion of your frame from the door to the front bumper is only about .095 inch thick, which is about 3/32 inch, or a little thicker than a nickel. That means that rocks, rust, dunes, or even curbs put your frame at risk of bending, cracking, or breaking.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: 1995-2004 Tacomas have c-channel frames that are notorious for bending and cracking. The c-channel frame also contributes to axle wrap and wheel hop at the rear axle. Trail-Gear?s answer to this problem is to box in and reinforce the inside of the frame. Our Tacoma Rear Frame Box Kit comes with two 3/16 inch thick plates that will completely box in the frame, and two pieces of DOM tubing. One tube is used for reinforcement and the other tube is used as an upper shock mount. The upper shock mount tube comes with metal sleeves and all the necessary hardware.;California Residents: WARNING"

This is winch is 24 volt configuration.

node.sales_desc: Protect your soft top windows from scratching and other damage with a window storage bag from Rugged Ridge. This easy to use storage bag stores your rear quarter and rear back window using a soft internal material and a heavy duty exterior fabric bag for the ultimate in protection. The internal fabric is placed between the windows to prevent scratching and window on window contact. Simply place the windows in between the fabric and gently roll the windows into an easy to store inchwindow roll inch. The rolled up bag can now be easily installed to the rear of your sport bar with attached nylon straps and buckles. This window storage bag solution is a must for those soft top owners who want to keep their windows out of harm?s way and prolong the life of their soft top. Each storage bag is backed by an industry leading 3 year limited warranty.

node.sales_desc: Safety is the most import part of any off-road recovery operation. The Rugged Ridge Winch Line Dampener helps reduce the risk of injury due to recoil in the in event of a winch line or recovery strap failure. The dampener is manufactured from durable vinyl and features heavy-duty storage pockets, and a reflective band. It folds up for easy storage and can been worn as a safety vest. Fits all winch cables and recovery straps up to 3? wide. Simply place the dampener on your recovery line and add weight to the pockets to help absorb energy, and reduce the whip of a failed winch cable.

node.display_name: K&N Filter Racing Custom Air Cleaner
node.long_desc: K&N's Universal Air Filters are designed and manufactured for a wide variety of applications including racing vehicles, radio-controlled cars, generators, snowmobiles, tractors, and other applications. node.sales_desc: The K&N PreCharger is a specially designed filter wrap made to extend the service interval of your K&N Filter when used in very dusty conditions. They are made from durable polyester material containing uniform micron openings. The PreCharger will stop small dirt particles; yet add little restriction to the airflow of the filter. The PreCharger is designed to be run dry and can be cleaned with K&N Filter Cleaner. The PreCharger is custom made to fit each application. Double stitched elastic openings assure that the PreCharger will stay in place. The PreChargers are available in a variety of colors.

node.display_name: K&N 77 Series High Performance Air Intake Systems
node.long_desc: Guaranteed to Provide more HP and Increased Acceleration;Engineered to Specific Vehicle Design;Easy to Install, Usually in 90 minutes or less!;Million Mile Limited Warranty;Lasts up to 100,000 Miles Before Service is Required (depending on driving conditions);Air Filter is Washable and Reusable;Works with Original Equipment Manufacturer Computer Systems;Street legal in most states;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Unlock and boost both horsepower and torque quickly and easily to your Jeep, Ford or Chevrolet truck, SUV or crossover with the K&N 77 Series High Performance Air Intake System. The K&N 77 Series features bolt-on installation with common hand tools and allows your engine to breathe easier by incorporating K&N's exclusive high-flow filter gauze material. The material is not only chock full of performance benefits, but is also durable and requires minimal servicing vs. full-on replacement like other OEM filter replacements, saving you money over the life of your vehicle.

K&N's popular 77 Series metal cold air intake systems for trucks and SUV's combine outstanding performance and sharp under-the-hood styling. The metallic finishes found on the mandrel-bent piping are not only eye-catching, but are designed to maximize airflow. K&N's chrome-like finish part numbers end in KP" while the more understated Grey finish kits end in "KG"perfect for the sleeper look.

Often times, restriction can exist between an air filter and the engine in the form of less-than-optimal bends and/or smaller diameter ducting. This is one of the weakest links in the airflow chain", which robs a vehicle of its natural horsepower. More often than not, that weak point is the factory air path leading to the engine serves as a bottleneck for performance. K&N 77-Series High Performance Air Intake Systems virtually eliminates air path restriction by replacing the air filter with a high-performance unit thereby creating less airflow resistance to the engine. The aluminum tube is properly engineered and effectively drives a cleaner flow of air into the engine, which translates into more horsepower, torque and fuel economy.

Though mass-produced to keep up with white-hot demand, K&N 77 Series kits have the look and feel of custom-made units. They come with an oversized high-flow conical air filter designed to provide increased surface area and dust filtration. The"

As an off-roader, you're serious about equipping your vehicle. But there's also the matter of equipping yourself. Whether you do overland trips, rock crawling, water crossing or other kinds of adventures, your comfort, health and safety are also important. With its durable UV and waterproof protection, the ARB 2500 awning is a solid choice for protection and shade. Count on 4 Wheel Parts for the best deals on the 2500 and other ARB awnings. Our purchasing power translates into great savings for you everyday low prices on $100 million in inventory from over 600 manufacturers.

Your ARB Awning Source
ARB offers a huge selection of retractable awnings perfect for your rugged outdoor lifestyle. The 2500 is just one of many top-notch choices. There's also the 1250 smaller sized and with the same durability as the 2500. Both are made from 300GSM poly/cotton ripstop canvas with a tough polyurethane coating, complete waterproofing and UVP 50+ sun protection. ARB's aluminum encased retractable awning offers the same protection plus a fully anodized aluminum housing.

node.long_desc: Electronically-selectable differential for on-demand traction;Provides 100% axle lock on demand via on/off switch;Switch is dash-mountable making it easier to reach;Most reliable on-demand differential on the market;Allows user to send all available torque to drive wheels;Provides maximum traction to tackle the most challenging terrain;Beefy, forged gears for added strength and reliability;Works in both forward and reverse;Time-tested performance and durability;New wiring harness designed for straightforward installation;Minimal wiring provides a clean, snag-free installation;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Eaton ELocker is an electronically-selectable locking differential designed for drivers that need maximum traction on-demand. The ELocker works like this: while driving under normal conditions, it performs just like an open differential. However, that's where the lone similarity ends. If an obstacle is encountered a rocky trail, muddy ditch or other challenge the driver has the ability to actuate the dash-mounted switch to activate 100% axle lock for maximum traction. The electromagnetic mechanism locks, capturing all of the engine's torque and sends equal amounts of it to the drive wheels. A second flip of the switch deactivates the unit to resume normal driving.

In addition, the ELocker's internal gears are net-forged, providing the strength and durability necessary for off-road and recreational driving. Unlike traditional forging, net-forging allows for a more precise gear which improves performance and reliability. Moreover, the electronic control also provides added reliability over similar air-controlled products and a cleaner overall install.

Only Eaton offers the broadest portfolio of differentials to meet the unique needs of performance and enthusiast drivers on the market today. Their lineup includes locking and limited-slip differentials, automatically engaging and driver selectable units as well. Choosing an Eaton Performance differential not only ensures ultimate performance, but their superior product quality reduces time spent in the garage and decreases wallet-draining driveline repairs.

node.long_desc: Bearing damage is a serious concern for any high-performance or high-mileage engine. Mishimoto Magnetic Oil Drain Plugs remove metal fragments in engine oil, thus extending and protecting the life of your engine. These oil drain plugs are constructed from billet 6061 aluminum with a powerful neodymium magnet. This magnet collects bearing and other harmful metallic fragments in engine oil, effectively removing them from circulation. This drain plug features a robust 24mm hex head and precise, durable threads for consistent use without stripping. Mishimoto Magnetic Oil Drain Plugs include a dependable dowty seal for superior protection against leaks. This M14 x 1. 5 oil drain plug fits the GMC/Chevrolet Duramax trucks, and many others.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: Transform the front of your Jeep with the Addictive Desert Designs Rock Fighter front bumper. The Rock Fighter is a stubby width bumper, meaning it will look good with any aftermarket fender you want to put on your JL. The patented universal light mount system in the center of the bumper allows you to mount any brand/size of light up to a 20 RDS or 5 cube lights. There are two additional cube light mounts on each top corner of the bumper. The two clevis mounts on the front of the bumper accept a 3/4" D-Ring and are reinforced to help out in tough situations. The Rock Fighter provides a greater approach angle to maximize offroad performance and two different top hoop options for even more front-end protection. This bumper is available with a low profile top hoop or a stinger. The main bumper structure comes in hammer black powder coat with satin black panels. This product is fully bolt-on and made in America."

Coverking's custom seat covers are by far the most popular seat covers with Jeep owners;Neoprene is a synthetic rubber with all the properties of rubber minus the health hazards of natural rubber such as allergic reactions;The elasticity of Neoprene allows the seat cover to fit like a glove Coverking neoprene is laminated with the top layer of polyester knitted fabric which adds appearance, colors, protects Neoprene and your seats from UV degradation etc;Neoprene is an ideal material for seat covers, it transforms the seats providing a sporty look; It protects the original seat covers for years of use in such diverse conditions as moisture, dirt, spills, pets and children;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Cars are not all made the same and neither are your seats. In some cases, the same vehicle make and model will have two different types of seating. Here at Coverking, we've mapped out thousands of different vehicles and custom crafted seat covers for each to ensure you get the best fit possible

All of our covers are digitally scanned using 3D- imaging equipment to produce a true custom fit. We also have the largest collection of patterns for all make and models. Our engineers spend weeks refining and perfecting patterns specifically for your seats, headrests and center-consoles. Each custom pattern is tested for precise fit and durability. The design process is a art-form - we have to balance and make sure the covers are easy to install while creating the best possible fit possible. All of our patterns are engineered to meet this goal

node.sales_desc: There is nothing more personal in a car than a steering wheel. You touch it, see it and interact with it each time you drive. Grant offers many types of wheels to make your project special, unique, and differentjust like you!

Westin's HDX LED Grille gives your truck's front end a whole new look and stylish functionality. Westin's HDX LED Grilles feature a form fitted mesh grille with laser cut Westin logo and 11-gauge steel frame with the light housing made of 16-gauge steel. Includes 1 double row combo LED light bar and 2 flood or spot single row LED light bars. Westin's HDX LED Grille offers an easy bolt-on installation so no drilling is required. Available in textured black powder coat finish.

Grant Motorsport harnesses offer comfort, convenience and safety. These harnesses are offered in a 4 point and 5 point mounting option. The 4 point uses an OEM style latch while the 5 point uses a latch and link style latch. Harnesses are also available in 2 in. and 3 in. belt widths. Grant Motorsport harnesses use a pro-glide belt adjusting system, include black mounting hardware, and have a removable sternum strap.
Westin's Nerf Bars provide you an extra-wide stepping surface for secure footing. Enter and exit your vehicle safely and easily with a set of side steps from Westin.

node.sales_desc: G2 Rear Axle Kits are made from high tensile alloy steels. These axles are forged and heat-treated for maximum strength. Big Spline options allow you to take advantage of even more added strength, gained from the larger diameter of the shafts. The larger diameter enables the shafts to withstand much higher torsional loads than the stock diameter. With either option, you can be assured that the weakest point of your driveline will not be your axle shafts.

node.long_desc: Eliminate weak locking hubs;Billet steel flange;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Using these drive flanges will eliminate the weak locking hubs providing you with less weak links for you offroad rig.

node.long_desc: G2's Bearing puller is designed specifically for differential work. This clamshell type bearing puller makes pulling bearings easier and faster while reducing the risk of damaging the bearing cage like two jaw pullers. This puller is perfect for fast and easy shim changes.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: G2's Bearing puller is designed specifically for differential work. This clamshell type bearing puller makes pulling bearings easier and faster while reducing the risk of damaging the bearing cage like two jaw pullers. This puller is perfect for fast and easy shim changes.

node.sales_desc: G2's high strength axle shafts are engineered to withstand the added load of high torque applications and to remedy the common faults found with factory shafts. Forged from high grade alloy steel and heat treated to exceed OEM specifications, these axles are designed for extended service life. Added features such as Big Spline options, rolled splines and use of better materials allow you to confidently run larger tires without the risk of failure.

node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear Ring and Pinion Sets
node.long_desc: Engineered and manufactured to handle increased load;Forged from high-strength 8620 Steel;Precision-machined to OE specifications for perfect mesh;Tight tolerances ensure easy set up and quiet OE-like operation;Double-lapped and shot-peened for improved longevity;Heat-treated for added durability;Wide application range from;Full 10-year warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
G2 Axle & Gear ring & pinion sets are engineered with the most advanced manufacturing process to stand up to the most demanding applications you might encounter. Designed from the ground up to hold up to oversized tires and high performance engines, these ultra-durable gears use use the latest technology and materials to offer the strongest and quietest performance on the market.

The process to produce such a high-quality G2 ring & pinion set is a long one, but the time-tested process ensures only the highest quality end product. For starters, only 8620 Steel is used to provide the most robust set around. The gears are forged then machined to exacting tolerances. This makes the G2 ring & pinion mesh perfectly, allowing for OE-like operation that won't have you running for earplugs--they're that quiet.

After the machining process, the ring & pinion are double-lapped to make the mating surface as smooth as possible, reducing friction and thereby extending longevity and service life. Moreover, the gears are also shot-peened and heat-treated to further improve strength for high-performance applications.

G2's Axle & Gear's ring & pinion sets are available for a wide range of vehicles, including AMC/Chrysler, Dana 30/35, Dana 44, Dana 50/60/70, Ford, GM, Toyota and Suzuki.


"

node.display_name: Off Camber Fabrications Roof Rack by MBRP
node.long_desc: Load up as much as you like. These versatile rack systems hold all your gear so you can keep the room inside your Jeep for yourself. The adjustable cross bar system fits hundreds of different accessory carriers including most Thule and Yakima racks. Made from mandrel bent 2 inch heavy walled tubing, this rack is built to not only look great, but withstand the toughest of loads. Each kit comes complete with all necessary hardware as well as precision cut gaskets that go between the roof and the rack mounts to ensure a leak free seal once the rack is installed. Each rack comes with two light tabs mounted at the rear of the rack and 5 light mounts towards the front (lights not included). The strength of this patented roof rack comes from a robust infrastructure we mount on the inside of the Jeep. With this bolted into place all weight from the cargo is distributed down to the tub or body of the Jeep.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: These over-built tubular fenders were designed for maximum suspension articulation while still maintaining a factory-style inner fender liner. Tough 0.120 inchwall tube is attached to 1/8 inch steel plating for one tough fender design. RRC Tubular Flat Fenders are direct factory replacements with a built in full fender liner (some drilling my be required) allowing for all factory engine accessories to be mounted by using the factory mounting hardware. Fenders are packed in pairs, primed for paint. Though these flares cover most tires, they are designed for off-road use and additional flare coverage may be needed for on road use in some states. Upgrade model bolts directly on using factory inner liner has ground welds and is ready for paint. The upgrade version does not include the side marker light housing and is designed for off-road use only.

node.sales_desc: T-Rex is a billet grille manufacturer dedicated to delivering a quality product. T-Rex specializes on a specific market and caters to the needs of the customer. Focused in the design department is in the fit and ease of installation which mean bolt-on billet grilles with less tools and no cutting which in turn equals more productivity. When it comes to manufacturing a quality product, it starts in the design department but it doesn't end there. T-Rex starts with solid stock of aircraft quality T-5 or T-6 billet aluminum rather than extruded aluminum as used by some competitors. Every billet grille is treated to a durable glossy powder-coat. The final stage of manufacturing includes a three-stage polishing and cleaning. The entire process takes place in their Southern California manufacturing facility.

node.sales_desc: TransCommand is an automatic-transmission-management computer that delivers functions that no single module can. Many truck owners prefer firmer shifts, especially when hauling large loads. TransCommand is the quick, efficient cure. The electronic module senses the load and commands the transmission to raise the hydraulic pressure accordingly. Light-throttle shifts are smooth and firm, while full-throttle or heavy-load driving produces solid, decisive shifts. Excessive clutch slippage is eliminated, extending transmission life.

node.display_name: Banks Power Torque Tube Exhaust Header Systems
node.long_desc: Header Material: Stainless 409;Header Finish: Natural;Flange Thickness: 5/8in.;Primary Tube Thickness: 16 Gauge;Primary Tube Size & Collector Size: 1 5/8in. X 2 1/2in.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Banks TorqueTube is a streamlined exhaust manifold designed to optimize exhaust flow and engine efficiency. Because the stock manifold's flange does not align squarely with the ports, flow is restricted. TorqueTube corrects the problem with a half-inch flange that is machined dead flat, and precisely fitted to the port pattern. You can hear the difference in the plusher, healthier exhaust note. Unlike the stock, failure-prone exhaust manifold, Banks TorqueTube is built of heavy, 409 stainless steel to weather a lifetime of heat, stress and abuse. The flange, welded to the tube assembly on both sides, will never crack or separate. The gasket is made of SMI 900, a material that stands up to super-hot temperatures. Bolts right on!

Keep your vehicle street legal with extended fender flares from Smittybilt.

Smittybilt's fender flares are 6 inches wide and are fabricated from UV stable ABS plastic. This ABS plastic is strong enough for the trail and looks good enough for the city streets. Bolt it on or paint it first to match your Jeep these UV stable ABS plastic is weather and fade resistant to last year after year.

node.long_desc: Universal;Black;Can be used with up to a 40? tire;Let?s you mount variable items to the back of your Jeep;Custom mounting straps included;Accessory mounts not included;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Smittybilt?s iRack II is a smart choice for outdoors enthusiasts and can accommodate a wide variety of trail gear with efficiency and ease. The ?I? in iRack stands for intelligent and the latest addition continues the tradition of supplying knowledgeable outdoorsmen and women with the superb accessories they seek for taming the great outdoors. The iRack II custom mounts to any spare tire up to 40 inches using heavy duty straps and has storage capacity for gear ranging from Jerry cans to Molle Pals Pouches to Trail or High-Lift Jacks. Multiple attachment points allow owners to carry whatever they need to have it accessible whenever they need it on the trail. Out on the trail, drivers crave long-lasting products they can trust to get the job done. Improving on Smittybilt?s inaugural iRack design, the iRack II is manufactured from 3/16 inch thick, cold-rolled steel, and is powder coated textured black for protection. This ensures the rack will maintain durability with minimal wear and tear issues over its lifespan.

node.long_desc: Visible up to a mile;Compact and highly visible;Strong magnetic back;Durable construction;Standard red LED;Waterproof, Emergency flashlight mode;High-capacity lithium battery;Dimensions 1.5 inch inch thick by 4.5 inch inches triangler;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Emergency Flare, UFO (Universal Flashing Object) is the easiest and safest emergency flare to use period. Traditional incendiary flares can cause accidental fires and once ignited cannot be simply turned off. The UFO is safe and comes with a lanyard loop that can allow the UFO to be hung as an indicator while on the trail. One of the key features of this UFO is the magnetic backing which allows it to be mounted on any metal surface. Count on the UFO rain or shine with its Lithium 123A battery every time. FEATURES: Visible up to a mile*, Compact and highly visible, Strong magnetic back, Durable construction, Standard red LED, Waterproof, Emergency flashlight mode, High-capacity Lithium battery EASY ON THE ENVIRONMENT: Replaces traditional flares that can cause accidental fires and harmful fumes. Government agencies and commercial fleets are moving away from incendiary flares because of fire, danger, pollution, and liability. POWER SOURCE: Powered by a high capacity CR123 lithium battery with a storage life of up to 1 year and a run time of up to 100 Hours. Storage temp: -400F to 2120F. Keep in your vehicle at all times.

node.sales_desc: Dee Zee Tool Box - Red Label Chest. Constructed of heavy duty Brite-Tread aluminum. Crown style lid with a full pan double-V stiffener for superior rigidity. Other features: lockable stainless steel paddle handles, dampened gas shocks, closed cell foam gasket, and self-adjusting strikers. Removable plastic tool tray to help keep small items organized.

node.long_desc: Non-Rusting .072 Brite-Tread Aluminum;BOLT Padlock Uses Your Truck Ignition Key (sold separately);Accommodates any 1 Padlock (sold separately);Internal Bends Add Superior Body Strength;Automotive Grade Rubber Bulb Lid Seal to Resist the Elements;Dampened Gas Shocks Hold the Lid Open at 90-Degrees;Full Length Hidden Hinge and Full Seam Welds;Double V-Pan Lid Stiffener Creates Strength and Rigidity;Plastic Tool Tray To Keep Smaller Items Organized;Available in Polished Aluminum or Texture Black Powder Coat Finish;Made in USA;Limited-Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Requiring 2.5 times more pry force than standard tool box latches, you can be assured the average thief won't have much luck with a crow bar trying to crack the lid. This truck chest is constructed from 20% thicker aluminum than our Red Label boxes with internal bends to reinforce the frame and a full pan double V lid stiffener. This utility box can outlast even the most motivated intruders.Our patented locking design lets you use your own one inch shackle padlock on the side of the box. The shackle is nested inside the side of the tool box, making it impossible to reach with bolt cutters. Choosing a BOLT padlock allows you to use your own truck ignition key to open the lock. No more carrying a full key ring to access various locks on the job site. (padlock sold separately)Heavy-duty striker bolts are latched with a patented slide mechanism. The chest lid closes with a single moving part for unmatched strength and security by eliminating weak welded points. The slide is released from the drivers side and releases the dual bolt strikers. An automotive grade rubber bulb seal wraps the undercarriage of the lid to resist Mother Nature's wrath.The Padlock Utility Chest has dampened gas shocks to keep the lid open at a 90-degree angle for full access to all your gear. A sliding plastic tool tray keeps smaller items organized and always within reach.

node.display_name: Dee Zee Padlock Crossover Tool Boxes
node.long_desc: The use of padlocks to protect valuable cargo date back to ancient trade routes and 2,000 years later, these simple locking mechanisms are still being utilized for their unmatched protection and durability.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The use of padlocks to protect valuable cargo date back to ancient trade routes and 2,000 years later, these simple locking mechanisms are still being utilized for their unmatched protection and durability.

node.display_name: Dee Zee Padlock Side Mount Tool Boxes
node.long_desc: Accommodates any 1 Padlock (sold separately);Internal Bends Add Superior Body Strength;Automotive Grade Rubber Bulb Lid Seal to Resist the Elements;Dampened Gas Shocks Hold the Lid Open at 90-Degrees;Full Length Hidden Hinge and Full Seam Welds;Double V-Pan Lid Stiffener Creates Strength and Rigidity;Three Lengths Available to Match your Bed Size;Made in USA;Limited-Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Side access boxes offer a great way to add a large amount of tool storage with full access to your tools from the side of your truck's bed. The Dee Zee Padlock Side Mount Brite Toolbox is built with non-rusting Brite-Tread aluminum, so you don't need to sacrifice style for functionality and durability.

We believe truck tool boxes need to be as functional as they are rugged, so as with many of our other tool boxes we use dampened gas shocks for smooth even opening and holding the lid open firmly at 90 degrees. Adjustable lid strikers ensure consistent latching and closing every time.

We take rugged seriously when we build a toolbox. Full length hidden hinge and full seam welds, internal bends, and Double V-Pan lid stiffener come together to provide unparalleled strength and rigidity.
